snippet: Fans followed Caroline Wozniacki, the Danish tennis player, as she watched her boyfriend, Rory McIlroy, who carded his second consecutive six-under-par 65 to take a two-stroke lead.
abstract: Fans follow Caroline Wozniacki, the Danish tennis player, as she watches her boyfriend, Rory McIlroy, who carded his second consecutive six-under-par 65 to take a two-stroke lead at the TPC Boston.
lead_paragraph: Fans followed Caroline Wozniacki, the Danish tennis player, as she watched her boyfriend, Rory McIlroy, who carded his second consecutive six-under-par 65 to take a two-stroke lead.

headline.seo: U.S. Open Loss Lets Caroline Wozniacki Watch Rory McIlroy Compete
headline.main: McIlroy Attracts Following at TPC Boston, but Not All Are Watching Him
headline.print_headline: McIlroy Leads, but Not All Are Following Him
